discussiontools-desc: Bisadilu sambu na kutomisa balutiti ya masolo.
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: Beto me kuka ve kubumba komantere na nge, sambu muntu ya nkaka salaka komantere nzila mosi ti nge. Meka diaka, to tula diaka lutiti yai sambu na kumona bakomantere ya nsuka.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Beto ke kuka ve kumona komantere yina nge ke pesila mvutu na lutiti yai. Ziku bo me vwansa yo to yo me kuma na lutiti ya nkaka. Tula diaka lutiti mpi meka diaka.
discussiontools-error-comment-is-transcl: Nge lenda sadila ve lien "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" sambu na kupesa mvutu na komantere yai. Sambu na kupesa mvutu, bweta na "$1" sambu na kusadila lutiti ya mvimba.
Nge lenda sadila ve lien "{{int:discussiontools-replylink}}" sambu na kupesa mvutu na komantere yai sambu nge me basisa yo na lutiti ya nkaka. Sambu na kupesa mvutu, kwenda awa: [[$1]].
discussiontools-error-comment-not-saved: Beto lenda basisa ve komantere na nge na lutiti ya mpa kibeni. Sambu na kumona bansoba ya nsuka, kopie komantere na nge mpi na nima sadila explorateur na nge sambu na kutula lutiti yai ya mpa.
discussiontools-error-lint: Nge lenda pesa ve mvutu na bakomantere ya lutiti yai sambu kifu mosi kele na wikitext. Nge lenda longuka mambu ya me tala kifu yai kana nge [$1 tanga muakanda], lomba lusadisu na [$2 kutula awa] to yika kifu na [$3 kukangula lutiti ya mvimba].
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove: Lolula, kukwenda na mode ya ke monana me pesama ve nzila sambu beto me mona $1 na komantere ya nge me sonika . [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:Ndinganamu/Lusadisu:BisadiluyaDisolo/Mvutu_kisadilu_mode_ke monana_bandilu Zaba mambu mingi].
discussiontools-error-noswitchtove-title: Nge me pesa ve nzila na mode ya ke monana
discussiontools-newtopic-missing-title: Nge lenda pesa ntu-diambu na disolo na nge. Kana nge bweta "{{int:discussiontools-replywidget-newtopic}}", beto ta yika disolo na nge kukonda ntu-diambu.
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|Mvutu mosi ya mpa|$1 bamvutu ya mpa|100=99+ bamvutu ya mpa}} na "$3".
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-pu: Bo me basisa komantere na nge.
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-to: Bo me yika disolo na nge.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool: Pesa nzila na kuyika disolo nswalu
discussiontools-preference-replytool: Pesa nzila na kupesa mvutu nswalu
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip: Pesa nzila na souscription na masolo
discussiontools-replywidget-abandon: Keti nge ke ndima nde kuvwansa komantere yina nge ke na kusonika?
discussiontools-replywidget-abandontopic: Keti nge ke ndima nde nge ke vwansa disolo yina nge ke sonika?
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: Nge me kota ve. Sambu na kubaka nsangu ya kele ti zina na nge kansi ve adrese IP na nge, nge lenda [$1 kota] to[$2 kusala konte].
discussiontools-replywidget-feedback: Pesa komanere sambu na kima yai
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-bo: $1 me kuma siniatire na nge. Sambu na kukatula yo, sonika $2. Zaba nde nge fwete tula ve siniatire na komantere na kisadilu yai. Siniatire na nge ta yikama yo mosi.
discussiontools-replywidget-signature-ti: Beto me mona kidimbu ya siniatire
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Kana nge bweta na "$1", nge me ndima kusadila mambu ya kuzitisa na ntwala ya kusadila wiki yai.
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Bo ta buma komantere na nge na [[$1]].
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Nge ta baka bansangu ya me tala bakomanetre ya mpa ya disolo yai.
Nge ta baka diaka ve bansangu ya me tala bakomantere ya mpa ya disolo yai.
tag-discussiontools-description: Nge me sonika na nzila ya BisadiluyaDisolo
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Muntu me yidika komantere ya ntama na BisadiluyaDisolo
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Muntu me yika disolo ya mpa na lutiti na nsadisa ya BisadiluyaDisolo
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Muntu me pesa mvutu na komantere na nsadisa ya BisadiluyaDisolo
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: BisadiluyaDisolo vandaka na mode ya ke monana
